game.s_dis: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 GBA Unblocked is a portable skateboarding game where players explore large levels, complete 190 goals, and perform stunts with Tony Hawk and 13 other pro skaters in career mode.
game.l_dis:
Play Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 GBA Unblocked – Skate Anywhere, Anytime

Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 GBA Unblocked is a skateboarding game for the Game Boy Advance featuring free-roaming levels, multiple goals, and iconic pro skaters. Perform tricks, explore stages, and compete against other pros or skate solo.

What is Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 GBA?

Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 GBA is a portable skateboarding experience with a career mode that allows players to complete 190 individual goals. Players can choose from Tony Hawk and 13 other pros, performing stunts like spine transfers and skitching across large levels.

How to Play Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 GBA

  • Explore Levels: Roam freely without time limits to complete goals and discover hidden areas.
  • Perform Tricks: Execute stunts such as spine transfers, grabs, flips, and skitching to earn points.
  • Choose Skaters: Select Tony Hawk or one of 13 other professional skaters with unique abilities.
  • Complete Goals: Tackle 190 different objectives, including point targets, combos, and collecting items.
  • Challenge Other Pros: Compete head-to-head against other skaters or skate solo for high scores.

Why Play Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 GBA Unblocked?

Play Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 GBA Unblocked online for free and enjoy portable skateboarding action. Explore levels freely, perform tricks, complete challenging goals, and experience classic THPS gameplay on the go.

Key Features

  • Unblocked Access: Play directly in your browser without restrictions.
  • Free-Roaming Career Mode: Explore levels with no time limits while completing goals.
  • Iconic Skaters: Choose from Tony Hawk and 13 professional skaters.
  • Stunts and Tricks: Perform spine transfers, grabs, flips, skitching, and more.
  • Portable Competitions: Challenge other pros or skate solo for points and high scores.

Become a Skateboarding Pro!

Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 GBA Unblocked tests your skateboarding skills, creativity, and strategy. Explore levels, perform tricks, and dominate challenges to become the ultimate skating legend!
